biotools.summary: The module allows you to easily manage the indexing and display of Elasticsearch on your Tripal website. It also easily enables Cross-Site Querying, allowing you to connect to other Tripal sites and provide additional search results to your users.

bioschemas.name: Tripal Elasticsearch
bioschemas.summary: The module allows you to easily manage the indexing and display of Elasticsearch on your Tripal website. It also easily enables Cross-Site Querying, allowing you to connect to other Tripal sites and provide additional search results to your users.
